titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning tin and pewter.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end of text: ... VVhitehall, the four and twentieth day of July, in the sixteenth yeer of Our reign.
Arms 24; Steele notation: many mine 2) Vessels, their.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Majesty: and
